name: Castle Demolition VR
description:
Castle Demolition VR is a casual game that allows the player to unleash total destruction upon unsuspecting structures. With 15 challenging levels to play, the good times just keep on rolling!

There are 15 levels to play, and 4 different types of ammo to destroy the castles with. Each new level has its strengths and weaknesses that can change how you approach them.
